title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in Java editor
description: When performing the steps to reopen a file in the Java editor after answering 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog, it takes significantly more time to select 'Revert' from the popup menu. The file contents are replaced with the original contents after a delay of 15 seconds.
OB: After answering 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original when selecting 'Revert' from the popup menu in the editor.
SR:
1. Open a file in the Java editor.
2. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog.
3. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
4. Repeat steps 1 and 2.
5. Select 'Revert' from the popup menu in the editor.
6. Observe that it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
